introduction.title: Hi, {{firstName}}
introduction.subtitle: How can we help you?
introduction.content: On this website you can handle your municipal affairs. You can request services, talk to a municipal official, and view the progress of your requests online. Of course you're always welcome at your local municipality, if this has your preference.

reminder.title: Don't forget to submit your project idea before the 31st of April
reminder.content: Your grant application still lacks a project idea. Make sure you submit this before the 31st of April, so that we can process your application.
